originalText.text: Ruthie is the best person in the world! I love to see her and every time I need anything from Yaffa, she is right there helping. Not once she disappointed me. I tried so many other places and nothing is better than Yaffa wigs in Manhattan. So grateful to have found that place.

originalText.text: Highly recommend!! Ruthie is truly a creative genius and top-notch in her field. Her exceptional attention to detail shines through, and every customer is left with a smile of satisfaction. Excellent customer service and genuine care for helping you achieve your goal makes her stand out.

originalText.text:
I bought my first wig from Yaffa a year ago and I absolutely adore it. Its still standing strong and I receive so many compliments with how it turned out!

I met with Yaffa personally and she was very accommodating with helping me choosing the perfect wig that fit my natural hair as close as possible. She gave tips and tricks into the wig applications and wig care to make sure I use the most out of it as possible.

The small, yet intimate studio created a relaxing atmosphere and they are always very attentive to whatever request you may have regarding the hair.

Yaffa is the sweetest woman I’ve ever had the pleasure of meeting.

Definitely would go back here again!

originalText.text: Ruthie is the best!!! I’ve been getting hair extensions for many years and I know great service when I see it. I had travel plans and needed my hair done ASAP so Ruthie stayed late multiple nights in a row to help me, and make sure I had the perfect hair for my trip. I am so glad I trusted her to get extensions, it was the best money I spent. Ruthie is warm, talented and extremely kind. I’m so happy I got to meet such a good person and get the exact hairstyle I wanted!
